column5: Anyone know where I might be able to get a steering cable fixed in southwestern Ontario?  I live in London so preferably around here but I also head down around Ridgetown/Chatham and Hamilton/Niagara a lot so those would also be options.  Thanks  jjcanoe
I only know of Aikmans in Mississauga, but not sure about london area...or Hamilton for that matter.
Thanks Rattletrap2, I'm in Mississauga everyday but I didn't want to drag the whole works around in the bunk of my truck, but it's looking like I might have to.  jjcanoe
Not sure if they do repairs...  but the Johnson Outdoors H.O. is in Burlington near Burloak... little closer to you.
If you can do the repairs yourself Rockies bait in Orillia (I think thats the name) is great to deal with and he will ship the parts.
There is a place in Waterloo, but I cannot remember the name.  edit- I recall the name now- Woods Electronics  outdoorguy61
Rockey's tackley services inc. parts only 1 877 328 8501 this is the to go guy  vance
Go with Rockey. I ordered a new foot pedal last year from him. Great guy and great customer service. I had my new part the next day.
Thanks for the edit on the name of Rockeys tackle. He does have great service. I thought I should mention that he will do the repairs but as your a little far away shipping might be an option.
Here's a MinnKota service center in Waterloo that might be a bit more convenient for you.  Relectronic-Remech  785 Bridge St. W.......unit 3 & 4  Waterloo  519-884-8138
The Burlington unit will send you to Aikmans
Thanks guys I think Waterloo would be best for me.  I'll bring it up there when I take my trip north for the trout opener and hopefully pick it up on the way back  jjcanoe
